::Trinity::

She looked up at him. "But, I'm awake now. I wanna go and play." she said 
with a slight whine in her voice. "I'm hungry, and I wanna go play. Can I go 
play? huh? Can I? I wanna play." She lowered her head and started to cry.  
She used her tiny paw to wipe her eyes. "I wanna play." still crying.


-O.M.---------------
>::Aerotaur::
>     "Hi Trinity.  I hope you slept well.  You should stay here for now.
>Until Windlord finishes the fight."  He smiles down at her.
